ygData.subject: Help me with my school project! Please!
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow EverQuest ers. I am a communications student at the University of Washington in Seattle, WA. For a class I m taking, I have to write a paper about
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow EverQuest'ers. I am a communications student at the
University of Washington in Seattle, WA. For a class I'm taking, I
have to write a paper about Everquest. It would REALLY help me
out if you could fill out my survey, so I can have some material in
which to write my paper. The survey is very short (it'll take
probably 2 minutes), and as if it's not already obvious, I will not
sell any of the information I receive. My only desire is to pass the
class, and learn more about other EQ players. With that said, I
apologize if you are seeing this for a second time. I'm trying to
get acquire as much data as possible, so I've posted this same
post onto various other groups. Sorry yet thanks.

Our survey is located at:
http://www.sitedifference.com/edu/COM480 .

If you would like more info on the class I'm taking, the course
website is at http://faculty.washington.edu/redwood/com480/

Thank you very much. My grade depends on you.
